website_summaries.verdict: Its narrow profile makes this corded mower easier to store, but cuts less grass in one trip, and its rigid safety bar can make it harder to maneuver.
pros: Lightweight and easy to maneuver, with enough power to cut thicker, higher grass
Design keeps debris from flying back to hit operators’ legs
cons: Somewhat narrow, requiring more trips up and down the lawn
Power cord tends to get in the way
Safety bar is difficult for some to hold in while operating

customer_reviews.title: Terrible bag catcher!
customer_reviews.text: I hate the bag on this mower. Dust and grass bits just blow right through the bag and into my face!! The foxtail stickers on the overgrown weeds just stuck thru the bag with some shooting at me. The bag is cloth and with air holes, allowing all this mess to shoot at you while trying to mow. I had to cover my face with a towel to breathe, and then take off my clothes (thank god it was my private back yard) to come in the house. I was covered in dirt, grass bits, and just a mess! Awful - I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mover for myself about 2years ago and love it so much I got another one for my parents home this year instead of driving mine over to do their lawn as I have been doing. We have small lawns, approximately 169 Sq. Ft.. Loaned mine to my neighbor and she went ahead and bought a similar Black and Decker for herself (she could not recall exactly what mine looked like when she purchased hers) - she loves her model as well.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Yay/Boo!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT mower, light weight and really does a good job. Keeping the long cord out of your way while you're mowing is a pain in the butt, but that wasn't a surprise, and it's hankable. What I DON'T like about this mower is the handle, which controls the off/on. To keep it running you have to continually squeeze the handle, and my hand gets tired. If you let up on it even a little bit, the mower slows down or turns off. If not for that, I'd give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: alibee

customer_reviews.title: It stops working
customer_reviews.text: This mower is lightweight, easy to assemble, and maneuvers easily, unfortunately. I gave it one star because i have not had it a full month. i used it twice on a small front yard, on my third time trying to use it, it stoped working. The motor would run, but the blades wont spin. I should have listened to the negative reviews and not purchaced it. I drove an hour away just to take it to the black and decker manufacturer/ support place, only for them to tell me there is no warrenty that covers it to be fixed. Im just out of $120. I will never purchace another of the same mowers again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth your trouble
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to be eco-friendly with an electric mower instead of gas. Well, this mower only lasted about 2 months and then just died. Up until yesterday it did work pretty good. Used it probably once every 2 weeks to cut a average size yard with no issues. Assembly was a snap and really easy to get close to edges, but you still need an edger. But yesterday about 1/8 of a way through the blade stopped but the motor stayed on. Nothing stuck (I was pretty vigilant with ensuring no debris was left after every use) and nothing broken. Attempted to trouble shoot and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: April K.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This mower worked fine. However, 15 inch is a bit small, even for a small yard. Main issue was the grass-cut-height lever. It was made of the cheapest plastic and very poorly designed. If I hit a small bump or branch, the blade would drop to the 1/2 inch setting and burn a hole in my grass. I lived like this for 2 summers before I became so fed up I simply threw the mower out. Like a boat, the best days of owning this lawn mower was the first and the last.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Daidola

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower try for yourself
customer_reviews.text: Please don't be discouraged many of my family and friends advised against electric mower and because I have my own mind and most ppl are stuck in their ways i decided to try! Wow happy i brought this mower easy to use light weight for easy use my only negative is that if my son cuts the grass i'm nervous he will run over the cord but thats part of being a momma he's 28 so i need to be more trusting he's a smart guy !
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Smith

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: lack power, to narrow, the cord slider did not work so handling the cord could become a dangerous feature. Ton arrow to be of any use, do not buyn this unit. The battery unit (20 inch) was usable for small areas but the was a TOTAL WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: TJ-STL

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months and then just quit working. I was careful to keep it cleaned after every use. It was put away out of the elements and yet...
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it works great for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to new home with about 1000sf lawn, I looked at gas powered mowers but didn't want to deal with gasoline, pull starting, fumes, noise etc. All I can say for my 1000sf lawn this thing worked great, I have only used it twice so far but will say it was easy to assemble, is easy to use and works good for my needs. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for small yards
customer_reviews.text: I have a small patio and I am a small female (patio is approx. 30 by 15). This is perfect because it is light weight and it does what it needs to do in a small patio. It is easy to handle, I put it together myself, it took my about 10 minutes to do my small yard. Definitely a great product for a condo size yard
customer_reviews.author: Melanie V. Millr

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this model for those who don't like gas powered ...
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower makes quick work of my lawn. Granted my lawn isn't very large but it does the work in short order. I would highly recommend this model for those who don't like gas powered lawn mowers.
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed ast how cute and how light this mower is it also does a good job and I'm able to handle this because I have a Disability I was able to push this with my hands it moves good easy to assemble and also the handle folds down I was able to pick it up and store it in my shed it did not take up as much room as my old black and Decker did .I rated this a 5 star because I loved it and for the price I could not go wrong .
customer_reviews.author: kat ,toot

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful. Great for handi-capabale folks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I am handicapped an need a lighter mower to do my lawns which front and back are sloped. What a difference from my gas mower. This makes mowing much easier. Only issue (which is common in most electrics) is the wet grass clogs up the mower. Wait til the lawns are "de-dewed" in other words dry.
customer_reviews.author: Badass

customer_reviews.title: I had it for 1 month only -Sept - Since ...
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 1 month only -Sept - Since august 26, 2017...now it does not want to start (checked all connections,etc. ) it would not start. Will contact seller? Black &Decker, too. It's not worth a thing, if it does not start at all. Its been sitting, and I need it badly of my yard. Tried, and tried several times.
customer_reviews.author: mahal

customer_reviews.title: B & D EM1500 is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I have a patio home with a small yard. (female buyer) This is a nice mower. Like the height adjustments and it is easy to use. Took about 15 minutes to assemble handles and knobs. The handle is a little long for me, but getting used to it. Had the Moe J 14" for 4 years, and wanted an easy to operate electric mower, more mower substance with grass height adjustments. This works good for me. Purchased from Amazon warehouse deals, item as described and happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: notions

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight mower
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mower. It’s not at all for a big yard, but t we had a townhouse with a small front yard and a little back fenced in area. It was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mower except for the placement of the electrical ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mower except for the placement of the electrical cord. It's hard to keep in place while mowing. The mower works great and is perfect for a small yard.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Handles the tall grass.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice mower. I had not been able to mow for 2.5 weeks due to travel. It had rained most of the time I was away. The grass grew in my absence to about 15". This little 10 Amp mower handled the job beautifully. The only issue that I had, was the occasional "shut-down" due to the very sensitive grip switch. I do believe this is the weak link of this mower.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't quite make the cut
customer_reviews.text: Though lightweight and fairly maneuverable, the starter lever started malfunctioning early on and the height adjustment continuously slips and moves out of the setting.
customer_reviews.author: B. Adams

customer_reviews.title: They don't make 'em like they used to....
customer_reviews.text: My impression from the B&D website was that the product is made in the USA. I stuck with this brand because I liked my first one. Sad to say, apparently Americans can't make lawnmowers any more. My old mower (also B&D) which finally gave out was probably 20 years old and had a good solid feel to it. With this new model, the price was OK but the overall quality is made-in-China plastic. I would happily pay more for a sturdier, American built mower if one existed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Finding this to be a great match for the smaller yard area here
customer_reviews.text: The old gas mower still ran but was about eighteen years old and knew it was coming close to replacement time. Never used an electric lawn mower before so it is taking some getting used to with the cord but no different than using a vacuum around the house. So far, very happy with the transition to a lighter mower requiring no gas, oil, and a workout with the pull cord!
customer_reviews.author: Linda O

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy for an old gal
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted . No gas no oil . No tugging on the cord and pulling my shoulder out. Affordable and easy to assemble. Light and easy to maneuver .The electric cord can be a pain but much better than the alternative , much quieter too ! Very satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: BJC

customer_reviews.title: Changes cutting height for no reason.
customer_reviews.text: While the mower works, have noticed it changes cutting height every so often. First time it did this, gave part of my yard a burr cut. It is light and the grass catcher seems heavy. Have cut the grass three times, would not buy again due to it being very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Bennett

customer_reviews.title: The edger is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this little mower! The edger is awesome ,it really gets close and pulls it in, just really great! This has a lot of cutting power!
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the worst purchases I've ever made. It doesn't cut evenly, the mere attempt at cutting normal grass is enough to slow down and almost kill the engine. It's a giant piece of crap and I'm severely disappointed in the quality of Black & Decker's products of late. It's showing that they don't care about quality anymore. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mower when we had a small yard. I would not suggest it for a larger one. But it held up very well to our smaller yard. And had minimal difficulty with the bumpy parts and uneven ground. It always stayed strong and trimmed well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mower -
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd or 4th B&D (now owned by Stanley Tools) and the best. A little smaller and lighter than the previous unit and more maneuverable (I have a small yard). My only complaint is the power switch, which is on one side - mildly annoying. Good choice for a small yard.
customer_reviews.author: John98103

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mower!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best purchases I've made from Amazon. This mower is perfect for my small lawn. It's light-weight, minimal assembly, easy to use, and store. It cuts the grass evenly and and has a height adjustment (as described). Maneuvers very well and the bag collects and makes it easy to dispense with the clippings/mulch. I highly recommend this mower!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Really good mower
customer_reviews.text: The mower arrived on time and packaged well. The instructions are clear and putting the handles on is really straight forward and quick. I enjoy using this mower. This is a great small yard mower. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay B

customer_reviews.title: This little mower is amazing. I used it once
customer_reviews.text: This little mower is amazing. I used it once. It cut the grass well. Was not hard to push. Push start button makes it so much easier. If you have a small yard it is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Just What I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant about purchasing an Electric Mower, but I am so glad I did for the size home/yard I have. It's convenient to have and no more running out of gas! It's easy for a woman to use. This mower lessens the headaches -no more trying to pull on a mechanism that I clearly have no strength to pull and hopefully start to cut the grass. This was my best summer investment ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective and smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I had a B&D electric mower for about 5 years before it died. Thought this would be a good replacement, but it was not. The one I got was defective out of the box. Part of the mechanism that adjust the cutting height was wedged behind the front wheel, preventing it from turning. However, Amazon customer service was great and they let me return it even after using it on my overgrown lawn.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Cuttings shot out from the sides
customer_reviews.text: good little product but cuttings shot out from the side and from the bottom, leaving a trail of cut grass all over not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: RP2

customer_reviews.title: A pretty powerful little mover!
customer_reviews.text: It is really light, but much more powerful than I expected. I had an 18 inch electric mower, and it really doesn't take me much longer to mow with this one because it's so much lighter, so I can push it easier, and faster.
customer_reviews.author: calvin h.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to use. Cut great just wish I'd bought one size larger, but that isn't an issue with the mower.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Aarti

customer_reviews.title: Caught on Fire While Using
customer_reviews.text: Have has this mower for 14 months. We have a fairly small yard, so this machine is not overly used or abused. Today it overheated, caught on fire and shut down. It is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lady

customer_reviews.title: Bag is useful yet small
customer_reviews.text: Slow takes forevvvver to cut. Quite though. Bag is useful yet small.
customer_reviews.author: Haskins

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever electric mower, and I have to say its awesome. My back yard hadn't been cut in months, and it did the job. Having a cord is a headache, but not as much as dealing with a gasoline engine. This thing was easy to put together, and of high quality you would expect of B&D.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Consider This One For Small Lawns.
customer_reviews.text: Another Black & Decker tool for my collection. So far so good, my only con is that you have to stop to empty the clippings tat tend to clog up the opening to the clippings bag.
customer_reviews.author: Al Guapo

customer_reviews.title: Even an old lady like me had NO problem with NEARLY no assembly and ...
customer_reviews.text: Even an old lady like me had NO problem with NEARLY no assembly and using it was a dream! Thanks for making this item available and don't even have to load it in my vehicle and unload it at home! How wonderful does it get!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: VaOkie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle and does a nice evening cut.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to handle, and does a really nice job on small areas. Instructions for assembly were a little daunting, but otherwise love it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Fisher (aka J.T.Fisher, Author)

customer_reviews.title: It still works great. Left it out in the rain a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started my second season with this. It still works great. Left it out in the rain a couple of times on accident and it still works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It is a small mower but it is so comfortable to use I don't mind it. I use it to mow my lawn every 2-3 weeks, it feels like I'm vacuuming my lawn. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Noelia

customer_reviews.title: poor basket design
customer_reviews.text: I had to recently reduce my rating for this mower. The mower is fine. The basket is a joke after a few uses. There are 3 pieces, that flex, and are held in place with several tabs, but the tabs don't have enough bite to stay in place. So after I used it, put some weight in it, it fell apart and grass went everywhere. Now it won't go back together. Since it flexes, you can't force it. I'm curious to know how many people will result in bungees or ratchet straps for the basket after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: great mower
customer_reviews.text: his is my second black and decker mower. I bought this one for my winter place. I love how easy it is to use. the one at my house is 5 yrs old and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: so it is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a "pint sized" lawnmower, but I have a small back yard, so it is perfect for me. I was even able to put it together myself.
customer_reviews.author: POOF

customer_reviews.title: You get what u pay for. The handle u ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what u pay for. The handle u squeeze to keep running is a cheapie and hard for old hands of 76 years to manage. Gonna try to devise a velcro device to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great electric mower for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we wanted to get away from gas mowers. Our lawn is fairly good sized and this mower handles is well. One caution, make sure to purchase the correct electric cord or you can burn up the motor. The only issue we had was putting together the grass catcher. It is a pain, Otherwise, great mower.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: My father in law loves his new mower. He says he wishes he got it years ago. Very good in close spaces, he states he doesn't even need to trim around edges anymore.
customer_reviews.author: A. Littleton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lawnmower!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cute little lawnmower! Does a great job for my small lawn and folds neatly away!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara P.

customer_reviews.title: The bag does not attach and within 2 months of ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag does not attach and within 2 months of use, the screws holding the handle to the base both came lose. One even popped out while in operation.
customer_reviews.author: OKCbudget

customer_reviews.title: I love it, does a great job for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love it, does a great job for the price!!! my kids are able to mow with it no problem and cuts tall grass well. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne P.

customer_reviews.title: Joes a great job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for me. It's small and light, I have a small yard, so I didn't need a big mower. It's not fancy, but real easy to use, and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Leccy Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: After using this twice with no problems, the third time it began to smoke. I have tried contacting black and decker, during business hours with no results. I have tried messaging them on their website with no results.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Odell

customer_reviews.title: It's a good mower for a small yard
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight, cuts well and the price is right. It's a good mower for a small yard.
customer_reviews.author: cdb4

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, but I should have spent more money and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's fine, but I should have spent more money and got a stronger bigger machine. I have a big yard. I'm not sure what I was thinking. It works fine for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Suemmccl

customer_reviews.title: My wife used it for over an hour and it took me two minutes to cut the cord with it go figure.
customer_reviews.text: It is really too small for even a small yard I should have ordered the 17 inch. My wife used it for over an hour and it took me two minutes to cut the cord with it go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this. Hardly any power, the bag catches 1/10 of the grass, and the other 9/10 gets stuck in the mower. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small areas
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple years now. It's great for my small yard. It picks up the grass clippings and empties easily. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Trixr4kz

customer_reviews.title: So far I liked it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I liked it !! Good quality, is plastic but looks and feels sturdy, my first experience was incredible simple to do the lawn. with 4 more times doing the lawn, I will have it paid in full (you may be charged as much as 25 usd for a quick mowing)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grass cutting
customer_reviews.text: I love this mower and with the bag attached saves me time
customer_reviews.author: Shaun M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great electric mower
customer_reviews.text: This a great lawnmower that we needed for our backyard bc we don't like gas ones. It's easy to use and even for our kids teenagers that can help us mow. But if it only came with a heavy duty extension cord that our son won't mow over and ruin. But that's more of a personal problem LOL. Does great job and can change the inches to cut and easy to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a month of using. Not suitable for very long grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good mower, but made for taller people than me
customer_reviews.text: A good mower, but made for taller people than me. Good thing my husband is tall enough for it, I am not!
customer_reviews.author: charli5cats

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I like it just fine
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I like it just fine! We have used it twice - both times without the grass bag. But if you adjust the height of the mower, it goes much easier over longer grass. Also a little loop for the cord, so it does not get in the way -
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very lightweight and easy to
customer_reviews.text: Little workhorse for my small backyard lawn. very lightweight and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for my small area very nicely. The mower is very light and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for my small area very nicely. The mower is very light and easy to use. I would have given five stars but I have small hands and did find it hard to hold the lever and push the button at the same time. My friend did not have any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used 2 times.  It’s broken
customer_reviews.text: We used this 2 times and it is now broken. I would please like to return this item. I have been a prime member for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes a perfect substitute for gasoline-operated mower which constantly require carburetor cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It makes a perfect substitute for gasoline-operated mower which constantly require carburetor cleaning. This mower is a fantastic idea and money saver.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: So far it's working great. The only minor con is the cord
customer_reviews.text: So far it's working great. The only minor con is the cord. Otherwise it's working well. I have a small garden and the grass is not as thick as the grass I see my brother's house in Houston!
customer_reviews.author: K. N. LE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. Works like a champ in my small lawn area
customer_reviews.author: Rufus

customer_reviews.title: Best price and good mower
customer_reviews.text: Shopped for a new electric lawn mower, on several sites. Best price and good mower.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: It's small and light weight. Just what I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: It's small and light weight. Just what I wanted. No, it doesn't mulch because it is small and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Tartan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do a great job of mulching/collecting thatch. There is still plenty left on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Humor4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Good for new homes with smaller yard.
customer_reviews.text: Smallest one I can find for my small lawn. Works great for small lawn for new homes.
customer_reviews.author: JeanStephenSHH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the light weight of this mower. Perfect for small, flat yard.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Amos

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it will, but man ...
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it will, but man does that lever hurt my hand. I couldn't mow for more than 5 minutes without being in serious pain.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, doesn't always bag well if grass is thick.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lawn mower!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and works great! My son calls it a vacuum because it is so quiet. ha!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Veatch

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put together. very small but if you just have like 100 sq yard or so it only took 15-20 min. It doesnt take up much space. Its irritating using a cord but it did the job. Its kool for nothing huge just regular size yard.
customer_reviews.author: Liza G

customer_reviews.title: The grass bag does become full quite quickly, in ...
customer_reviews.text: The grass bag does become full quite quickly, in hindsight I might have gone for the 21 inch mower for the size of yard I maintain. Functional for <2000sqft of yard IMO.
customer_reviews.author: David McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Basic electric mower
customer_reviews.text: Feels a bit flimsy, but worked well the first time I used it. Sufficient for our small yard.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Even though we have a large space, I needed a small mower. This did the trick and does a good job on the edges, plus the lite weight makes it nice
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tilton

customer_reviews.title: fantastic mower
customer_reviews.text: we own the corded black and decker weed eater and love it so i knew i would love their lawn mower and i do! first time working an electric mower so the cord was a bit of an awkward situation for a bit but i adjusted to it eventually. def has a lot of power, the grass catched is fantastic but on the small side so you may have to empty it a couple times depending on your yard size and grass length. very easy to adjust the height as well
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Manning

customer_reviews.title: too light weight and handle was too long and not ...
customer_reviews.text: too light weight and handle was too long and not adjustable. I have to hold it way down the handle to keep it on the ground or it misses strips of grass.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Chase

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for patio homes and condos
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for patio homes and condos. Lightweight, easy to handle and does a great job. This is the ideal mower for small yards!
customer_reviews.author: CC El Paso

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet durable
customer_reviews.text: We have a small yard and this Corded Mower does a great job and folds up pretty compact to fit in our small storage shed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Merlo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice light weight lawn mower with plenty of power to tackle tall grass
customer_reviews.author: mthrtrck

customer_reviews.title: We Would Recommend This Mower
customer_reviews.text: We have a very small yard. This mower works very well and is light weight. My wife loved using it to do "her" yard. Easy to assemble and easy to use. Priced less than the Big Box store.
customer_reviews.author: Miltspoon

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this small electric mower. Bag holds a lot of grass.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Magruder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just as described, last black and decker lawn mower lasted 15 years, I know that this will last awhile
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: A good "little" mower!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little mower. The only drawback is the cord gets in the way. It's definitely only for a small yard. I am happy with my purchase but in the future I will spend a little more and get the cordless version!
customer_reviews.author: Connie B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light. The switch is a bit cheap. Without the bag it clogs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for small yards
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my small, townhouse yard. Easy to clean and the top folds down to easily fit into a small tool shed.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: A great small mower
customer_reviews.text: A great small mower. Handle can be a bit of a pain to hold on (very tense spring), but performance and quality feels far better than my old Kobalt mower otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Dan T.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this but ended up giving it away. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this but ended up giving it away. It might work for other people but it was not what I was looking for. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: good enough for my own lawn
customer_reviews.text: very light, good enough for my own lawn. collect all the leaves. Much much better than my old one
customer_reviews.author: PEIHUA ZHU

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blade bent within a week and the housing broke within six weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The second time i used it broke. Motor is spinning but the blades were not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Lawn Mower, 10-Amp, 15-Inch (EM1500)
product_meta.description: Size:15-Inch DeckBlack & Decker EM1500 Corded Mower with Edge Max, Orange, 15"
feature_bullets: Height Adjust- 6 settings, with a height of cut between 1-1/10" and 3-1/10"
Edge Max- close up to the edge cutting for a cleaner job
Low Profile Design- Ideal for accessing under shrubs & obstacles
Compact & Go- collects up to 25% more grass for less emptying
Grass bag will be either cloth (pictured) or plastic depending on availability

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
